CssProperty.name: table-layout
CssProperty.description: Controls the algorithm used to lay out the table cells, rows, and columns.

entry.description: Use any automatic table layout algorithm.
Use the fixed table layout algorithm.

CssProperty.name: caption-side
CssProperty.description: Specifies the position of the caption box with respect to the table box.

entry.description: Positions the caption box above the table box.
Positions the caption box below the table box.

CssProperty.name: border-spacing
CssProperty.description: The lengths specify the distance that separates adjoining cell borders. If one length is specified, it gives both the horizontal and vertical spacing. If two are specified, the first gives the horizontal spacing and the second the vertical spacing. Lengths may not be negative.

entry.description: Selects the separated borders border model.

CssProperty.name: empty-cells
CssProperty.description: In the separated borders model, this property controls the rendering of borders and backgrounds around cells that have no visible content.

entry.description: Borders and backgrounds are drawn around/behind empty cells (like normal cells).
No borders or backgrounds are drawn around/behind empty cells.
